title: Outfitology - Outfit Inspiration Website
description: A visual discovery platform similar to Pinterest for browsing, discovering, and saving fashion inspiration into personalized boards.

title: UploadItIn - Essay Grading System
description: An educational web app for managing essay assignments, featuring Automated Essay Scoring (AES) using the Latent Semantic Analysis (LSA) NLP method.

title: Android Fitness App
description: A comprehensive mobile fitness companion featuring gym and cardio workout guides, along with health tools like BMI and protein calculators.
